faqs.q: How many calories in a peanut butter and jelly sandwich?
faqs.a: About 400 kcal for a standard version with 2 slices bread, 2 tbsp PB, and 1 tbsp jelly.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a PB&J sandwich?
faqs.a: Roughly 12 g, mostly from the peanut butter.

faqs.q: Does PB&J have a lot of sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, around 20 g total, mainly from jelly and bread.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in a peanut butter and jelly sandwich?
faqs.a: Use thinner bread slices, less PB, or sugar-free jelly to reduce by 50-100 kcal.
It has 18 g fat per sandwich, primarily healthy unsaturated fats from peanut butter.
